original_text: For Jerusalem is ruined, and Judah is fallen: because their tongue and their doings are against the Lord, to provoke the eyes of his glory.
korean_text: 예루살렘이 멸망하였고 유다가 엎드러졌음은 그들의 언어와 행위가 여호와를 거역하여 그의 영광의 눈을 범하였음이라

sentences.original_text: because their tongue and their doings
to provoke the eyes of his glory.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 영광의 눈을 격분하게 하려 함이라
